00052 EZRADIO_ConfigRet_t ezradio_configuration_init(const uint8_t* pSetPropCmd)
00053 {
00054   /* EZRadio command buffer */
00055   uint8_t ezradioCmd[16u];
00056   ezradio_cmd_reply_t ezradioReply;
00057 
00058   uint8_t col;
00059   uint8_t response;
00060   uint8_t numOfBytes;
00061 
00062   /* While cycle as far as the pointer points to a command */
00063   while (*pSetPropCmd != 0x00)
00064   {
00065     /* Commands structure in the array:
00066      * --------------------------------
00067      * LEN | <LEN length of data>
00068      */
00069 
00070     numOfBytes = *pSetPropCmd++;
00071 
00072     if (numOfBytes > 16u)
00073     {
00074       /* Number of command bytes exceeds maximal allowable length */
00075       return EZRADIO_CONFIG_COMMAND_ERROR;
00076     }
00077 
00078     for (col = 0u; col < numOfBytes; col++)
00079     {
00080       ezradioCmd[col] = *pSetPropCmd;
00081       pSetPropCmd++;
00082     }
00083 
00084     if (ezradio_comm_SendCmdGetResp(numOfBytes, ezradioCmd, 1, &response) != 0xFF)
00085     {
00086       /* Timeout occured */
00087       return EZRADIO_CONFIG_CTS_TIMEOUT;
00088     }
00089 
00090     if (ezradio_hal_NirqLevel() == 0)
00091     {
00092       /* Get and clear all interrupts.  An error has occured... */
00093       ezradio_get_int_status(0, 0, 0, &ezradioReply);
00094       if (ezradioReply.GET_INT_STATUS.CHIP_PEND & EZRADIO_CMD_GET_CHIP_STATUS_REP_CHIP_PEND_CMD_ERROR_PEND_MASK)
00095       {
00096         return EZRADIO_CONFIG_COMMAND_ERROR;
00097       }
00098     }
00099   }
00100 
00101   return EZRADIO_CONFIG_SUCCESS;
00102 }

00117 void ezradio_get_adc_reading( uint8_t adc_en, uint8_t adc_cfg, ezradio_cmd_reply_t *ezradioReply )
00118 {
00119     /* EZRadio command buffer */
00120     uint8_t ezradioCmd[EZRADIO_CMD_REPLY_COUNT_GET_ADC_READING];
00121 
00122     ezradioCmd[0] = EZRADIO_CMD_ID_GET_ADC_READING;
00123     ezradioCmd[1] = adc_en;
00124     ezradioCmd[2] = adc_cfg;
00125 
00126     ezradio_comm_SendCmdGetResp( EZRADIO_CMD_ARG_COUNT_GET_ADC_READING,
00127                               ezradioCmd,
00128                               EZRADIO_CMD_REPLY_COUNT_GET_ADC_READING,
00129                               ezradioCmd );
00130 
00131     ezradioReply->GET_ADC_READING.GPIO_ADC         = ((uint16_t)ezradioCmd[0] << 8) & 0xFF00;
00132     ezradioReply->GET_ADC_READING.GPIO_ADC        |=  (uint16_t)ezradioCmd[1] & 0x00FF;
00133     ezradioReply->GET_ADC_READING.BATTERY_ADC      = ((uint16_t)ezradioCmd[2] << 8) & 0xFF00;
00134     ezradioReply->GET_ADC_READING.BATTERY_ADC     |=  (uint16_t)ezradioCmd[3] & 0x00FF;
00135     ezradioReply->GET_ADC_READING.TEMP_ADC         = ((uint16_t)ezradioCmd[4] << 8) & 0xFF00;
00136     ezradioReply->GET_ADC_READING.TEMP_ADC        |=  (uint16_t)ezradioCmd[5] & 0x00FF;
00137 }

00147 void ezradio_ircal(uint8_t searching_step_size, uint8_t searching_rssi_avg, uint8_t rx_chain_setting1, uint8_t rx_chain_setting2)
00148 {
00149     /* EZRadio command buffer */
00150     uint8_t ezradioCmd[5u];
00151 
00152     ezradioCmd[0] = EZRADIO_CMD_ID_IRCAL;
00153     ezradioCmd[1] = searching_step_size;
00154     ezradioCmd[2] = searching_rssi_avg;
00155     ezradioCmd[3] = rx_chain_setting1;
00156     ezradioCmd[4] = rx_chain_setting2;
00157 
00158     ezradio_comm_SendCmd( EZRADIO_CMD_ARG_COUNT_IRCAL, ezradioCmd);
00159 }

00168 void ezradio_ircal_manual(uint8_t ircal_amp, uint8_t ircal_ph, ezradio_cmd_reply_t *ezradioReply )
00169 {
00170     /* EZRadio command buffer */
00171     uint8_t ezradioCmd[EZRADIO_CMD_ARG_COUNT_IRCAL_MANUAL];
00172 
00173     ezradioCmd[0] = EZRADIO_CMD_ID_IRCAL_MANUAL;
00174     ezradioCmd[1] = ircal_amp;
00175     ezradioCmd[2] = ircal_ph;
00176 
00177     ezradio_comm_SendCmdGetResp( EZRADIO_CMD_ARG_COUNT_IRCAL_MANUAL,
00178                               ezradioCmd,
00179                               EZRADIO_CMD_REPLY_COUNT_IRCAL_MANUAL,
00180                               ezradioCmd );
00181 
00182     ezradioReply->IRCAL_MANUAL.IRCAL_AMP_REPLY   = ezradioCmd[0];
00183     ezradioReply->IRCAL_MANUAL.IRCAL_PH_REPLY    = ezradioCmd[1];
00184 }

00198 void ezradio_tx_hop(uint8_t inte, uint8_t frac2, uint8_t frac1, uint8_t frac0, uint8_t vco_cnt1, uint8_t vco_cnt0, uint8_t pll_settle_time1, uint8_t pll_settle_time0)
00199 {

00201     uint8_t ezradioCmd[9u];
00202 
00203     ezradioCmd[0] = EZRADIO_CMD_ID_TX_HOP;
00204     ezradioCmd[1] = inte;
00205     ezradioCmd[2] = frac2;
00206     ezradioCmd[3] = frac1;
00207     ezradioCmd[4] = frac0;
00208     ezradioCmd[5] = vco_cnt1;
00209     ezradioCmd[6] = vco_cnt0;
00210     ezradioCmd[7] = pll_settle_time1;
00211     ezradioCmd[8] = pll_settle_time0;
00212 
00213     ezradio_comm_SendCmd( EZRADIO_CMD_ARG_COUNT_TX_HOP, ezradioCmd );
00214 }
